quizz.question:
I’ve just passed my driving test!Now I must save money for a car. Then no more walking to the train station in the morning!
How will the person probably go to work tomorrow?
Road closed because of roadworks. Monday 28 September – Thursday 1 October. Use Broad Street.
answers: You can use the road only during these dates.
Broad Street is closed during these dates.
You can use Broad Street during these dates.

quizz.question: SPECIAL OFFER! All laptops over £500 come with a free printer. Offer ends Friday!
answers: All laptops come with a free printer.
All laptops in the shop cost more than £500.
If you spend more than £500 on a laptop, you get a printer.

quizz.question:
Dance class finishes at 17: 30, not 17.00 tomorrow so don’t wait for me outside the library. I’ll meet you at the cinema instead.
Where do they usually meet?
Choose your seat when you book online or before your flight for your 10% discount.
answers: You must choose your seat before you get on your flight.
If you choose your seat in advance, you pay less.
You pay less when you book a flight online.

quizz.question:
To: Josh
From: Mum
Anna phoned. She forgot to tell you – the concert is the 6th, not 5th. Let her know if you can go.
answers: Josh didn’t know that the date of the concert had changed.
Anna has forgotten what date the concert is on.
Anna needs to tell Josh what day the concert is on.

results.answer: You can use Broad Street during these dates.
If you spend more than £500 on a laptop, you get a printer.
If you choose your seat in advance, you pay less.
Josh didn’t know that the date of the concert had changed.
